name: Finessed
description:
You can be a Wizard or Fighter 

An NPC will take over the unused class

You fight with one of these classes later in the game

Stand on your three stat zones to level up. 

The NPC will also level up it's stats

Use WASD to move, right and left mouse buttons to attack

A special thanks to Joe for the game art!

THE DIMENSIONS WILL BE BROKEN UNLESS YOU FULL SCREEN
